[b]ÃŽâ€˜Ãâ‚¬ÃÅ’ Ãâ€žÃŽÂ¿ amazon.co.uk[/b]
A collection of cartoon shorts featuring the lovable, irritable Donald Duck. In 'The Inferior Decorator', a wily bumblebee sends Donald's home fix-up project into chaos. In 'Out of Scale', Donald's toy train runs off-track when two charming chipmunks play hide-and-seek in his tiny toy train village. And in 'Mr Duck Steps Out', Donald and his lady friend step out for a toe-tappin' night out on the town, until three little ducks decide to step out with them. 
.
.
